price: ដើម្បីពួកគេនឹងទទួលទាននូវភោគផលរបស់វា និងអ្វី ដែលដៃរបស់ពួកគេបានធ្វើវា។ ដូចេ្នះ តើពួកគេមិនដឹងគុណទេឬ?
arabic: لِيَأۡكُلُواْ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتۡهُ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: liyakulū min thamarihi wamā ʿamilathu aydīhim afalā yashkurūna
